activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#4871
activity.text:
Hi @aparnacoronasafe , I am currently working on this issue. There are two problems with keeping the design consistent with "General Instruction" cards with reference to my local build:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83979298/222643450-d1855082-f429-404d-968a-1820e7fc6c9d.png)


1. "General Instructions" card accepts only strings but the Procedure card would need a boolean.
2.  "General Instruction" card is too small to show details of the Procedure.

Hence, I am going for "Body Details" card clone.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#4928
activity.text: @kaushikc44, Have u joined a team? I have contributed to this repository also and [DevDoctors-CARE](https://fossunited.org/fosshack/2023/project?project=DevDoctors-CARE) is my project for FOSSHack. We are currently looking for members.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#4894
activity.text: Can I have info on who should be able to edit i.e remove the selected item if needed?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#4894
activity.text:
The X has a function i.e to deselect the selected item. Ideally, it should be hidden for user roles who cannot edit and enabled for user roles who can edit.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/83979298/221647600-a385f981-27c8-411a-a890-6f563378ea87.png)
